definition: (of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

sentences.english: An offended brother is more unyielding than a fortified city.
sentences.chinese: 弟兄結怨，勸他和好，比取堅固城還難。

sentences.english: If you would make an enemy,lend a man money and ask it of him again.
sentences.chinese: 你若想與人結怨，只須先借錢給他，再向他催討。

sentences.english: If you would make an enemy, lend a man money and ask it of him again.
sentences.chinese: 你若想與人成仇結怨，只要借錢給人再催還。

sentences.english: That lady was at deep enmity with her neighbours.
sentences.chinese: 這個婦人與鄰居結怨甚深。

sentences.english: Never destroy your relationship with people.
sentences.chinese: 記住，永遠不要與人結怨。

definition: the State of Qǐ in modern Qǐ county 杞縣|杞县, Henan (c. 1500-445 BC), a small vassal state of Shang and Western Zhou for most of its existence
to oppose each other with equal harshness (idiom); tit for tat/measure for measure
to stir up trouble/to invite disaster
to denounce/to condemn/to call to account/to punish
to rise in revolt/to raise difficult questions
gongs and drums overture to a Chinese opera/to create a disturbance
